directions: In a tall glass combine the Wild Turkey, the orange and lime juices, the sugar syrup, and 4 ice cubes. Fill the glass with the seltzer and stir the drink. Garnish it with the orange slice.
ingredients: 1 1/2 ounces (1 jigger) strained fresh orange juice
1 1/2 ounces (1 jigger) strained fresh lime juice
title: Wild Turkey Spritzer
